job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Recommendations
job.description:
Who We Are
Multi Media, LLC owns and operates one of the most popular live streaming entertainment platforms on the internet, earning spots on Alexa’s most visited websites, top 50 globally and top 20 in the United States.
As a Machine Learning Engineer on the Data team, you will introduce models to power recommendations and content ranking for millions of users on a daily basis. We are looking for individuals with hands-on experience building end-to-end recommendations systems at scale.
What You’ll Be Doing
Create high-performing machine learning models to understand user interest, improve broadcaster discovery, and drive user engagement
Build highly-scalable and reliable data pipelines to generate and manage high quality data sets
Work cross-functionally with teams across product, data science, dev ops, and engineering to drive platform and architecture decisions
Requirements
What we’re looking for
BS in STEM or social sciences
7+ years industry experience
Strong coding skills, preferably in Python
Experience building and deploying machine learning systems to drive recommendations or personalization
Strong experience in designing large, data-driven applications
Deep understanding of machine learning algorithms and best practices
Benefits
What You’ll Get
Competitive salary and benefits
Fully Remote Optional
100% covered Health, Vision, Dental, and Life Insurance for you and any dependents
401k with 5% matching
11 Paid Holidays, Paid Vacation, Paid Sick Days, and one Floating Personal Day.
Paid Lunches in-office, or if Remote, a $40/week stipend for GrubHub.
And much more!
Multi Media, LLC is an equal opportunity employer and strives for diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We encourage people from underrepresented groups to apply!
